title: US Ambassador's Visit to Adani's Mega Renewable Energy Project Highlights India-US Energy Partnership | Business
text: US Ambassador's Visit to Adani's Mega Renewable Energy Project Highlights India-US Energy Partnership US Ambassador to India Eric Garcetti visited Adani Group's renewable energy site on July 16, expressing admiration for the projects. The interaction emphasized the significance of India-US relations in sustainable energy. Other diplomats like Japan's Ambassador Suzuki have also recognized Adani's innovative efforts. [Devdiscourse News Desk](/devdiscourse-stories)| Updated: 19-07-2024 10:13 IST | Created: 19-07-2024 10:13 IST - Country: - India US Ambassador to India, Eric Garcetti, visited Adani Group's significant renewable energy project site at Khavda and the Mundra port on July 16. Adani Group Chairman Gautam Adani expressed gratitude for the visit, highlighting the Ambassador's engagement with Indian culture and deep discussions on geopolitics, energy transitions, and India-US relations. Ambassador Garcetti shared his insights, expressing inspiration from Adani Green's innovative projects that support India's zero-emissions goals. He stressed the importance of sustainable energy and the bilateral partnership between the US and India in forging environmental solutions for a cleaner future. This visit by an American Ambassador is among the most notable by a foreign dignitary to Adani's facilities. Additionally, Japan's Ambassador Hiroshi Suzuki and British High Commissioner Lindy Cameron also recently engaged with Adani, underscoring the global interest in Adani's sustainable initiatives. (With inputs from agencies.)
